meanings.sent1: She received many approbations for her hard work.
meanings.sent2: The teacher's approbations motivated the students to do their best.
meanings.sent3: The puppy wagged its tail in approbation when given a treat.
meanings.sent4: The artist's painting received universal approbation from critics.
meanings.sent5: The crowd's loud approbations filled the auditorium with joy.

meanings.sent1: The company's approbations were displayed proudly on their website.
meanings.sent2: His promotion was a clear sign of the organization's approbation of his work.
meanings.sent3: The passport officer stamped my document with approbation.
meanings.sent4: The certificate of approbation hung on the wall, signifying his achievement.
meanings.sent5: The mayor's approbation of the new policy was met with cheers from the citizens.
